sqlMap.select:
SELECT MUUID AS "muuid", PERIOD AS "period", t4105.SOLID_ID AS "solidId", t41.SOLID_NAME AS "solidName", t41.SOLID_CODE AS "solidCode", t4105.OUTPUT AS "output", t4105.UTILIZATION AS "utilization", t4105.UTILIZATION_RATE AS "utilizationRate", t4105.BACK_OUTPUT AS "backOutput", t4105.BACK_RATE AS "backRate", t4105.BACK_PRICE AS "backPrice", t4105.BACK_TOTAL AS "backTotal", t4105.OUTER_VALUE AS "outerValue", t4105.OUTER_PRICE AS "outerPrice", t4105.OUTER_TOTAL AS "outerTotal", t4105.DISPOSE_VALUES AS "disposeValue", t4105.DISPOSE_RATE AS "disposeRate" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 t4105 JOIN TDUHM41 t41 ON t4105.SOLID_ID = t41.SOLID_ID WHERE 1 = 1
t4105.FATHER_ID = #muuid#
ORDER BY t4105.MUUID ASC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 (
PERIOD,
SOLID_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID ) VALUES (
#period#,
#solidId#, #departmentId:VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 (
PERIOD,
SOLID_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID ) VALUES (
#period#,
#solidId#, #departmentId:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 SET OUTPUT = #output# , BACK_OUTPUT = #backOutput# , BACK_PRICE = #backPrice# , BACK_TOTAL = #backTotal# , OUTER_PRICE = #outerPrice# , OUTER_TOTAL = #outerTotal# WHERE MUUID = #muuid#
UPDATE ${platSchema}.TDUHM4100 SET STATE = '已完成' WHERE MUUID = #muuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUM(T4105.OUTPUT) as output, SUM(T4105.BACK_OUTPUT) as backOutput, SUM(T4105.BACK_TOTAL) as backTotal, SUM(T4105.OUTER_TOTAL) as outerTotal, T4105.PERIOD as period , T41.SOLID_NAME as solidName, T41.SOLID_CODE as solidCode, T41.SOLID_TYPE as solidType, T4105.SOLID_ID as solidId, T4105.UTILIZATION AS "utilization", T4105.UTILIZATION_RATE AS "utilizationRate", T4105.BACK_RATE AS "backRate", T4105.BACK_PRICE AS "backPrice", T4105.OUTER_VALUE AS "outerValue", T4105.OUTER_PRICE AS "outerPrice", T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES AS "disposeValue", T4105.DISPOSE_RATE AS "disposeRate", T41.RANK AS "rank", DEPARTMENT_ID AS "departmentId", T41.STATE as "state" FROM TDUHM4105 AS T4105 INNER JOIN TDUHM4100 AS T4100 ON T4105.FATHER_ID = T4100.MUUID INNER JOIN TDUHM41 AS T41 ON T4105.SOLID_ID = T41.SOLID_ID WHERE 1=1
T4105.PERIOD = #period#
GROUP BY T4105.SOLID_ID

SELECT T4105.MUUID AS "muuid", T4105.PERIOD AS "period", T4105.SOLID_ID AS "solidId", T4105.OUTPUT AS "output", T4105.UTILIZATION AS "utilization", T4105.UTILIZATION_RATE AS "utilizationRate", T4105.BACK_OUTPUT AS "backOutput", T4105.BACK_RATE AS "backRate", T4105.BACK_PRICE AS "backPrice", T4105.BACK_TOTAL AS "backTotal", T4105.OUTER_VALUE AS "outerValue", T4105.OUTER_PRICE AS "outerPrice", T4105.OUTER_TOTAL AS "outerTotal", T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES AS "disposeValues", T4105.DISPOSE_RATE AS "disposeRate", T41.SOLID_NAME AS "solidName", T41.SOLID_CODE AS "solidCode", T41.RANK AS "rank", T41.SOLID_TYPE AS "solidType", DEPARTMENT_ID AS "departmentId", T41.STATE as "state" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 AS T4105 LEFT JOIN TDUHM41 AS T41 ON T4105.SOLID_ID=T41.SOLID_ID WHERE 1=1
PERIOD = #period#
T4105.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#
T41.SOLID_TYPE = #solidType#
SOLID_NAME LIKE #solidName#
ORDER BY T4105.SOLID_ID

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN (T4105.OUTPUT = null or T4105.OUTPUT = '') THEN '0' else T4105.OUTPUT END) as "output", SUM( CASE WHEN (T4105.UTILIZATION = null or T4105.UTILIZATION = '') THEN '0' else T4105.UTILIZATION END) as "utilization", SUM(CASE WHEN (T4105.BACK_OUTPUT = null or T4105.BACK_OUTPUT = '') THEN '0' else T4105.BACK_OUTPUT END) as "backOutput", SUM( CASE WHEN (T4105.BACK_PRICE = null or T4105.BACK_PRICE = '') THEN '0' else T4105.BACK_PRICE END) as "backPrice", SUM( CASE WHEN (T4105.OUTER_PRICE = null or T4105.OUTER_PRICE = '') THEN '0' else T4105.OUTER_PRICE END) as "outerPrice", SUM( CASE WHEN (T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES = null or T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES = '') THEN '0' else T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES END) as "disposeValues",
T41.SOLID_NAME as "solidName",T41.SOLID_ID AS "solidId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 AS T4105 INNER JOIN TDUHM41 AS T41 ON T4105.SOLID_ID = T41.SOLID_ID WHERE 1=1
T4105.PERIOD = #period#
GROUP BY T41.SOLID_NAME,T41.SOLID_ID

SELECT T4105.PERIOD AS "period", T41.SOLID_NAME AS "solidName", T41.SOLID_CODE AS "solidCode", T41.SOLID_TYPE AS "solidType", T4105.SOLID_ID AS "solidId", T4105.UTILIZATION AS "utilization", T4105.UTILIZATION_RATE AS "utilizationRate", T4105.BACK_RATE AS "backRate", T4105.BACK_PRICE AS "backPrice", T4105.OUTER_VALUE AS "outerValue", T4105.OUTER_PRICE AS "outerPrice", T4105.DISPOSE_VALUES AS "disposeValue", T4105.DISPOSE_RATE AS "disposeRate", T41.RANK AS "rank", T41.STATE AS "state" FROM TDUHM4105 AS T4105 INNER JOIN TDUHM4100 AS T4100 ON T4105.FATHER_ID = T4100.MUUID INNER JOIN TDUHM41 AS T41 ON T4105.SOLID_ID = T41.SOLID_ID WHERE 1 = 1
T4105.PERIOD = #period#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 SET OUTPUT=#output#, UTILIZATION=#utilization#, UTILIZATION_RATE=#utilizationRate#, BACK_OUTPUT=#backOutput#, BACK_RATE=#backRate#, BACK_PRICE=#backPrice#, BACK_TOTAL=#backTotal#, OUTER_VALUE=#outerValue#, OUTER_PRICE=#outerPrice#, OUTER_TOTAL=#outerTotal#, DISPOSE_VALUES=#disposeValue#, DISPOSE_RATE=#disposeRate# WHERE MUUID = #muuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT t4105.MUUID AS "muuid", t4105.PERIOD AS "period", t4105.SOLID_ID AS "solidId", t41.SOLID_NAME AS "solidName", t41.SOLID_CODE AS "solidCode", t4105.OUTPUT AS "output", t4105.UTILIZATION AS "utilization", t4105.UTILIZATION_RATE AS "utilizationRate", t4105.BACK_OUTPUT AS "backOutput", t4105.BACK_RATE AS "backRate", t4105.BACK_PRICE AS "backPrice", t4105.BACK_TOTAL AS "backTotal", t4105.OUTER_VALUE AS "outerValue", t4105.OUTER_PRICE AS "outerPrice", t4105.OUTER_TOTAL AS "outerTotal", t4105.DISPOSE_VALUES AS "disposeValues", t4105.DISPOSE_RATE AS "disposeRate", t4105.DEPARTMENT_ID AS "departmentId" FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 t4105 JOIN TDUHM41 t41 ON t4105.SOLID_ID = t41.SOLID_ID
WHERE 1 = 1
t4105.PERIOD = #period#
t4105.DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#
t41.SOLID_NAME = #solidName#
t41.SOLID_TYPE = #solidType#
t41.SOLID_ID = #solidId#
ORDER BY t41.RANK ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.TDUHM4105 ( PERIOD, SOLID_ID, OUTPUT, UTILIZATION, UTILIZATION_RATE, BACK_OUTPUT, BACK_RATE, BACK_PRICE, BACK_TOTAL, OUTER_VALUE, OUTER_PRICE, OUTER_TOTAL, DISPOSE_VALUES, DISPOSE_RATE, DEPARTMENT_ID ) VALUES ( #period#, #solidId#, #output#, #utilization#, #utilizationRate#, #backOutput#, #backRate#, #backPrice#, #backTotal#, #outerValue#, #outerPrice#, #outerTotal#, #disposeValue#, #disposeRate#, #departmentId:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${platSchema}.TDUHM4100 WHERE SOLID_ID = #solidId# and PERIOD = #period# and DEPARTMENT_ID = #departmentId#
